articles.title: Leon Marchand sets 400 IM record, last individual mark of Michael Phelps - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Leon Marchand set the world record in the men's 400-meter individual medley, breaking the last individual mark that Michael Phelps had held from his illustrious swimming career.
articles.content: French youngster Leon Marchand set the world record in the men's 400-meter individual medley Sunday, breaking the last individual mark that Michael Phelps had held from his illustrious swimming caree… [+2648 chars]
